Description.Name: Basic Attack: Dancing Blades
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 6 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Passion
Description.Desc:
When Jane triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color>, or performs a move that deals DMG to the enemy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Upon reaching the maximum <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>, Jane enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> is increased by 25%. Additionally, if Jane's Anomaly Proficiency exceeds 120, each extra point raises her ATK by 2, up to a maximum of 600.
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's skills that deal damage consume <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Activating a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> regenerates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. Jane exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state when all of her <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color> is consumed.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Salchow Jump
Description.Desc:
Entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state grants Jane one use of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color>.
When available, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch rapid consecutive attacks forward, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold the button during the consecutive attacks to extend the skill duration. Release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to trigger the Finishing Move early.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the consecutive attacks, and Jane takes 40% reduced DMG. Jane is invulnerable during the Finishing Move.
Using and damaging an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color> while in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state generates <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Phantom
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to trigger.
A quick slide dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Jane has an extra dodge. Before she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, she alternates between the two dodges. After entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane can pass through enemies in front when dodging.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Edge Jump
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
If after the first dodge, launch an upward slash in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If after the second dodge, perform a consecutive slashes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Phantom Thrust
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Launch three quick rushing slashes in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Swift Shadow
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
If after the first dodge, unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If after the second dodge, leap up and deliver three consecutive attacks to enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Swift Shadow Dance
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Aerial Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Leaps into the air to launch consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Leaps into the air to launch multiple consecutive kicks forward, then sweeps across, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout
Chain Attack: Flowers of Sin
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Weaves between and slashes enemies in a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Jane directly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Final Curtain
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Weaves between and slashes enemies with a powerful attack in a large area in front, followed by a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Jane directly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state upon activating the skill, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Dark Thorn
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash multiple slashes at enemies in front, followed by a downward thrust, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Lutz Jump
Description.Desc:
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, when the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slash enemies in front quickly multiple times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Last Defense
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Gale Sweep
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap up and swiftly slash the enemy, then execute a wide sweeping slash across a large area in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1261004.Name: EX Special Attack: Aerial Sweep - Clearout

Name: Core Passive: Insight
Additional Ability: Sore Spot
Desc: When Jane's attacks hit an enemy, it causes them to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, lasting for 10s. If any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state and causes the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect, the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect duration is extended by 5s, and <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit, with a base CRIT Rate of <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> and CRIT DMG of 50%. Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <color=#2BAD00>0.1%</color>.

When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> is increased by 20%. When the enemy is already suffering from an Attribute Anomaly, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color> towards the target is increased by an additional 15%.

Name: Core Passive: Insight
Additional Ability: Sore Spot
Desc: When Jane's attacks hit an enemy, it causes them to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, lasting for 10s. If any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state and causes the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect, the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect duration is extended by 5s, and <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit, with a base CRIT Rate of <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> and CRIT DMG of 50%. Each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency further increases this CRIT Rate by <color=#2BAD00>0.11%</color>.

If any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state and causes the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect, the <color=#F0D12B>Flinch</color> effect duration is extended by 5s, and <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG has a chance to trigger a critical hit, with a base CRIT Rate of <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> and CRIT DMG of 50%. 1.Name: Crime Counsel
1.Desc: The maximum uses of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Salchow Jump</color> are increased by one. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by an extra 15% and each point of Jane's Anomaly Proficiency increases her DMG by 0.1%, up to a maximum increase of 30%.
1.Desc2:
"A criminal consultant advises on criminology, not on how to actually commit crimes."
Jane suddenly leaned closer and blinked.
"Of course, if you see it as the latter... I won't mind."

2.Name: Adapt to the Environment
2.Desc: When Jane's attack hits an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, or when any squad member triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy in the <color=#FFFFFF>Gnawed</color> state, 15% of the enemy's DEF is ignored. Additionally, when <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG triggers a critical hit, the CRIT DMG dealt is increased by an additional 50%.
2.Desc2:
Gaze into the abyss, and it gazes back. That's only the first step.
"Then you must approach, enter, and understand it. This is the second step."
"The final step... is to resist becoming it."

3.Name: Anonymity
3.Desc2:
"Anonymity — that means to become anyone. Your favorite person, perhaps~"
"Or maybe, your worst fear?"

4.Name: Adapt and Thrive
4.Desc: When any squad member triggers the <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> effects, all squad members' Attribute Anomaly DMG is increased by 18%, lasting 15s.
4.Desc2:
"Whether you're a hunter or the hunted usually depends on your perspective. However, I favor a more straightforward assessment—"
"The Loser is the prey."

5.Name: Compulsive Hoarder
5.Desc2:
Jane's room is filled with all sorts of things, especially fast food.
"Isn't it nice here? There's food within reach everywhere~"

6.Name: "Shady" Technique
6.Desc: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, Jane's CRIT Rate increases by 20%, and CRIT DMG by 40%. After any squad member inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color>, Jane instantly enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Passion</color> state, and gains max <color=#FFFFFF>Passion Stream</color>. When <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> triggers a critical hit, Jane performs an additional attack on the target, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> equal to 1,600% of her Anomaly Proficiency.
6.Desc2:
On the streets, the means don't matter, only the outcome.
"Seeing the darkest desires reveals the most crucial weaknesses."
